name: That Time I left Home
description:
That time I left home is short 5-10 minute short story point and click, where you play as a young adult and someone who is on their own for the first time.

The controls
Left-Click - Interact with objects
Right-click - Speed up text
Escape - Open Game Menu

I worked with a great artist on this small game and it would be great if you could go see their other works! https://linktr.ee/byrnethebooks. They did all the art that you see in the game.

For sound I used a collection of free sounds off websites and youtube. You can find in the comments below
